ABOUT CRACKJOBS
Practice Makes Perfect
We're democratizing interview preparation by connecting ambitious job seekers with experienced professionals from Google, Amazon, Meta, and other top companies.
OUR MISSION
Why CrackJobs Exists
Landing your dream job shouldn't be a matter of luck‚Äîit should be the result of thorough preparation and confidence built through real practice with industry professionals.
We believe that quality interview preparation should be accessible to everyone, not just those who can afford expensive coaching programs or have insider connections at top companies.
CrackJobs bridges the gap between theory and practice by providing affordable, on-demand access to professionals who conduct real interviews at their companies. They know exactly what hiring managers look for because they are the hiring managers.

WHAT MAKES US DIFFERENT
The CrackJobs Advantage
Real Industry Experience
Our mentors aren't professional coaches‚Äîthey're active Product Managers, Data Scientists, HR Leaders, and Analysts who interview candidates regularly at Google, Amazon, Meta, Flipkart, and other top companies. They know the exact evaluation criteria because they use it daily.
100% Anonymous & Safe
No names, no emails, no judgments visible between you and your mentor. Practice in a completely safe environment where you can make mistakes, ask "stupid" questions, and learn without fear of real-world consequences to your professional reputation.
Structured Feedback System
Every session includes detailed, actionable feedback across multiple dimensions‚Äîtechnical skills, communication, problem-solving approach, and culture fit. You get a clear roadmap of what to improve, not vague advice like "practice more."
Affordable & Flexible
Pay ‚Çπ999-‚Çπ2,499 per session‚Äînot ‚Çπ50,000+ for a full program. Book sessions on your schedule, practice exactly what you need, and get started within 24 hours. No long-term commitments, no packages you don't need.

HOW IT WORKS
From Sign-Up to Success in 4 Steps
1
Browse Expert Mentors
Filter by role (PM, HR, Data Analytics, Data Science), company (Google, Amazon, Meta), and topic. View mentor profiles, ratings, and availability.
2
Book Your Session
Choose a time slot that works for you, pay securely (‚Çπ999-‚Çπ2,499), and receive instant confirmation. Sessions are available 24/7.
3
Practice 55-Min Interview
Join the video call, go through a realistic interview simulation, and get live feedback. Completely anonymous‚Äîno names, no emails visible.
4
Get Detailed Evaluation
Receive structured feedback within 48 hours covering technical skills, communication, problem-solving, and specific areas to improve. Track your progress over multiple sessions.
